_header: With a fairness of light and knowledging
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, triumph of
_description: Mordecai as a type of Christ, clothed in royal garments, in a sermon, ‘De corpore Cristi’ — one couplet in a Latin sermon De corpore Christi

CULIi38.Transcription:
Wyth a fairnesse of lyt and knoulechynggþou hast i mad lord
                    þi cloȝyngg

Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
